headline: Assessing Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum And Carbon Capture Developments
summary: Recent performance snapshot for Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Occidental Petroleum (OXY) has seen mixed share performance lately, with a 0.1% decline over the past year but gains of about 10% over both the past month and past 3 months. At a recent close of US$45.39 and reported annual revenue of US$26.6b with net income of US$1.46b, the stock’s risk and return profile may look different depending on your time horizon.
